name: HEARTH (VR01)
description:
Project realized during the course of Virtual Reality held at the Politecnico di Torino, Italy.

Made  by Fabio Gavinelli, Marian Alexandru Ilies, Aurora Vassallo, Valeria Milan, Ilaria Occhipinti

Story:

Not too distant in the future, you wake up on a desert island after being wrecked due to bad weather. 

The continuous exploitation of Earth's resources and pollution beyond measure has brought the planet to collapse.

But perhaps there is little hope... the choice is yours!
